name: LOADED (itch)
description:
This game was created in 50 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2022

PITCH

A Monster trapped your spirit inside his dice to cheat at the casino.

Make him win and try to break free !

CONTROLS

  • Move : Arrows or your keyboard's equivalent of WASD
  • Jump : Spacebar when your die is on the ground

CREDITS

  • Art, Dialog & Concept : Lutias
